question.text: You are driving on a motorway. By mistake, you go past the exit that you wanted to take. You should

explanation.text: It is against the law to reverse, cross the central reservation or drive against the traffic flow on a motorway. If you have missed your exit ask yourself if your concentration is fading. It could be that you need to take a rest break before completing your journey.

answer.text: carefully reverse on the hard shoulder
carry on to the next exit
carefully reverse in the left-hand lane
make a U-turn at the next gap in the central reservation
